member.summary: Gets the .config file Xml element for binary services configuration.

member.name: P:CodeFluent.Runtime.BinaryServices.BinaryServicesConfiguration.TypeName
member.summary: Gets or sets the type name of the class deriving from the BinaryLargeObject class. Based on the 'typeName' Xml attributes from the configuration file. The default is SqlServerBinaryLargeObject.

member.name: P:CodeFluent.Runtime.BinaryServices.BinaryServicesConfiguration.ChunkSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the blob chunk to use for streaming operations. The default is 65536. Based on the 'chunkSize' Xml attributes from the configuration file.

member.name: P:CodeFluent.Runtime.BinaryServices.BinaryServicesConfiguration.DefaultChunkSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the blob chunk to use for streaming operations. The default is 65536. Based on the 'chunkSize' Xml attributes from the configuration file.

member.name: P:CodeFluent.Runtime.BinaryServices.BinaryServicesConfiguration.UseHttpErrors
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use IIS configured HTTP errors. Based on the 'useHttpErrors' Xml attributes from the configuration file. The default is true.
member.value: true if HTTP errors must be used; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:CodeFluent.Runtime.BinaryServices.BinaryServicesConfiguration.NotFoundImageDefaultWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the width of the image used when a blob was not found. Based on the 'notFoundImageDefaultWidth' Xml attributes from the configuration file. The default is 120 (pixels).

member.name: P:CodeFluent.Runtime.BinaryServices.BinaryServicesConfiguration.NotFoundImageDefaultHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets the height of the image used when a blob was not found. Based on the 'notFoundImageDefaultHeight' Xml attributes from the configuration file. The default is 120 (pixels).

member.name: P:CodeFluent.Runtime.BinaryServices.BinaryServicesConfiguration.WaitTimeOnSharingViolation
member.summary: Gets or sets the wait time on sharing violation when writing to or reading from the cache. Based on the 'waitTimeOnSharingViolation' Xml attributes from the configuration file. The default is 100 (milliseconds).

member.name: P:CodeFluent.Runtime.BinaryServices.BinaryServicesConfiguration.RetryCountOnSharingViolation
member.summary: Gets or sets the retry count on sharing violation when writing to or reading from the cache. Based on the 'retryCountOnSharingViolation' Xml attributes from the configuration file. The default is 10.

member.name: P:CodeFluent.Runtime.BinaryServices.BinaryServicesConfiguration.UseWebMimeTypes
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use IIS metabase web MIME types or registry MIME types. Based on the 'useWebMimeTypes' Xml attributes from the configuration file. The default is true if the current context is ASP.NET; otherwise false.
member.value: true if IIS metabase must be used; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:CodeFluent.Runtime.BinaryServices.BinaryServicesConfiguration.AllowNonInteractiveRelativePaths
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether relative paths are allowed when environment is running as a non interactive process.
member.value: true if relative paths are allowed when environment is running as a non interactive process; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:CodeFluent.Runtime.BinaryServices.BinaryServicesConfiguration.AutoLoadMetaData
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether blob meta data must be automatically loaded. Based on the 'autoLoadMetaData' Xml attributes from the configuration file. The default is true.
member.value: true if meta data auto load is enabled; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:CodeFluent.Runtime.BinaryServices.BinaryServicesConfiguration.IsCacheEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether blob content caching is enabled or not. Based on the 'cacheEnabled' Xml attributes from the configuration file. The default is true.
member.value: true if blob content caching is enabled; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:CodeFluent.Runtime.BinaryServices.BinaryServicesConfiguration.IsIconCacheEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether blob icon caching is enabled or not. Based on the 'iconCacheEnabled' Xml attributes from the configuration file. The default is true.
member.value: true if blob icon caching is enabled; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:CodeFluent.Runtime.BinaryServices.BinaryServicesConfiguration.IsClientCacheEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether HTTP user agent caching is enabled. Based on the 'clientCacheEnabled' Xml attributes from the configuration file. The default is true.
member.value: true if client caching is enabled; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:CodeFluent.Runtime.BinaryServices.BinaryServicesConfiguration.NotFoundDefaultUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL used to represent a blob that is not found in the persistence layer. Based on the 'notFoundDefaultUrl' Xml attributes from the configuration file. The default is null (or nothing in Visual Basic).

member.name: P:CodeFluent.Runtime.BinaryServices.BinaryServicesConfiguration.BitsServerUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL used for the BITS server The default is http://+:1027/{0}/ with {0} defined as the current CodeFluent runtime context name.

member.name: P:CodeFluent.Runtime.BinaryServices.BinaryServicesConfiguration.BitsServerOptions
member.summary: Gets or sets the BITS server options.

member.name: P:CodeFluent.Runtime.BinaryServices.BinaryServicesConfiguration.BitsServerTempDirectoryPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the temporary path used for the BITS server.

member.name: P:CodeFluent.Runtime.BinaryServices.BinaryServicesConfiguration.IconCacheDirectoryPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the icon cache directory path. Based on the 'iconCacheDirectoryPath' Xml attributes from the configuration file. The default is the DefaultIconsSubDirectory constant.

member.name: P:CodeFluent.Runtime.BinaryServices.BinaryServicesConfiguration.ContentDisposition
member.summary: Gets or sets blob content disposition when rendered to HTTP user agents. Based on the 'contentDisposition' Xml attributes from the configuration file. The default is null (which in general means attachment, not inline).

member.name: P:CodeFluent.Runtime.BinaryServices.BinaryServicesConfiguration.IconFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the icon image format. Based on the 'iconFormat' Xml attributes from the configuration file. The default is PNG.

member.name: P:CodeFluent.Runtime.BinaryServices.BinaryServicesConfiguration.CacheDirectoryPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the cache directory path. Based on the 'cacheDirectoryPath' Xml attributes from the configuration file. The default is the DefaultSubDirectory constant. Argument {0} will be replaced by the current Windows logged in identity temporary directory. Argument {1} will be replaced by the DefaultSubDirectory constant. Argument {2} will be replaced by an auto generated string which depends on the connection string.

member.name: P:CodeFluent.Runtime.BinaryServices.BinaryServicesConfiguration.CacheFilePathFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the cache file path format. Argument {0} will be replaced by identifiers values. Argument {1} will be replaced by the property or data column name. Argument {2} will be replaced by the entity CLR full type name. Argument {3} will be replaced by the blob original file name, if any. Argument {4} will be replaced by the blob original file extension, if any. Based on the 'cacheFilePathFormat' Xml attributes from the configuration file. The default is '{0}{1}{2}{3}'.

member.name: P:CodeFluent.Runtime.BinaryServices.BinaryServicesConfiguration.CacheSparseLevel
member.summary: Gets or sets the cache sparse level. This indicates the number of sub directory to create before storing a cached blob content. Based on the 'cacheSparseLevel' Xml attributes from the configuration file. The default is 3.

member.name: M:CodeFluent.Runtime.BinaryServices.DataReaderStream.Read(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads a sequence of bytes from the current stream and advances the position within the stream by the number of bytes read.
member.param: An array of bytes. When this method returns, the buffer contains the specified byte array with the values between offset and (offset + count - 1) replaced by the bytes read from the current source.
The zero-based byte offset in buffer at which to begin storing the data read from the current stream.
The maximum number of bytes to be read from the current stream.
member.returns: The total number of bytes read into the buffer. This can be less than the number of bytes requested if that many bytes are not currently available, or zero (0) if the end of the stream has been reached.

member.returns: The new position within the current stream.

member.summary: Writes a sequence of bytes to the current stream and advances the current position within this stream by the number of bytes written. Throws a NotSupportedException for DataReaderStream.
member.param: An array of bytes. This method copies count bytes from buffer to the current stream.
The zero-based byte offset in buffer at which to begin copying bytes to the current stream.
The number of bytes to be written to the current stream.

member.summary: Reads a sequence of bytes from the current stream and advances the position within the stream by the number of bytes read.
member.param: An array of bytes. When this method returns, the buffer contains the specified byte array with the values between and ( + - 1) replaced by the bytes read from the current source.
The zero-based byte offset in at which to begin storing the data read from the current stream.
The maximum number of bytes to be read from the current stream.

member.param: An array of bytes. This method copies bytes from to the current stream.

The number of bytes to be written to the current stream.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.BinaryServices.ServiceBinaryLargeObject.SaveOptions.PriorityForeground
member.summary: Transfers the job in the foreground. Foreground transfers compete for network bandwidth with other applications, which can impede the user's network experience. This is the highest priority level.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.BinaryServices.ServiceBinaryLargeObject.SaveOptions.PriorityHigh
member.summary: Transfers the job in the background with a high priority. Background transfers use idle network bandwidth of the client to transfer files. This is the highest background priority level.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.BinaryServices.ServiceBinaryLargeObject.SaveOptions.PriorityNormal
member.summary: Transfers the job in the background with a normal priority. Background transfers use idle network bandwidth of the client to transfer files. This is the default priority level.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.BinaryServices.ServiceBinaryLargeObject.SaveOptions.PriorityLow
member.summary: Transfers the job in the background with a low priority. Background transfers use idle network bandwidth of the client to transfer files. This is the lowest background priority level.

member.name: T:CodeFluent.Runtime.CodeFluentEntityAction
member.summary: Specifies a runtime action on a given instance of an entity. Some actions can be canceled.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.CodeFluentEntityAction.Deleting
member.summary: The instance is being deleted. The action is cancelable.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.CodeFluentEntityAction.Deleted
member.summary: The instance has been deleted. The action is not cancelable.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.CodeFluentEntityAction.Saving
member.summary: The instance is being saved. The action is cancelable.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.CodeFluentEntityAction.Saved
member.summary: The instance has been saved. The action is not cancelable.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.CodeFluentEntityAction.CopyTo
member.summary: The instance properties are being copied to another instance or to a dictionary. The action is not cancelable.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.CodeFluentEntityAction.ReadRecord
member.summary: The instance properties are being read from a persistence reader interface. The action is not cancelable.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.CodeFluentEntityAction.ReadRecordOnSave
member.summary: The instance properties are being read from a persistence reader interface after a successful save. The action is not cancelable.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.CodeFluentEntityAction.Validating
member.summary: The instance state is being validated. The action is cancelable.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.CodeFluentEntityAction.Validated
member.summary: The instance state has been validated.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.CodeFluentEntityAction.Custom
member.summary: Defines a custom action. The action may be cancelable depending on the custom action.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.CodeFluentEntityAction.Attached
member.summary: The instance is being attached to another instance. The action is not cancelable.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.CodeFluentEntityAction.CopyFrom
member.summary: The instance properties are being copied from another instance of the same type or from a dictionary. The action is not cancelable.

member.name: P:CodeFluent.Runtime.Design.OpenDialog.DereferenceLinks
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether shortcuts should not be treated as their target items. This allows an application to open a .lnk file rather than what that file is a shortcut to.
member.value: true if shortcuts should not be treated as their target items; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:CodeFluent.Runtime.Design.OpenDialog.CreatePrompt
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether prompting for creation if the item returned in the save dialog does not exist. Note that this does not actually create the item.
member.value: true if prompting for creation if the item returned in the save dialog does not exist; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:CodeFluent.Runtime.Design.OpenDialog.OverwritePrompt
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether when saving a file, prompt before overwriting an existing file of the same name.
member.value: true if prompt before overwriting an existing file of the same name; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:CodeFluent.Runtime.Design.OpenDialog.HideMruPlaces
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether hiding the list of places from which the user has recently opened or saved items. This value is not supported as of Windows 7.
member.value: true if hiding the list of places from which the user has recently opened or saved items; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:CodeFluent.Runtime.Design.OpenDialog.HidePinnedPlaces

member.summary: Model properties must be reloaded.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.CodeFluentReloadOptions.RowVersion
member.summary: Only the rowversion must be reloaded. This flags is only used if the entity handles concurrency.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.CodeFluentReloadOptions.BinaryLargeObjects
member.summary: Binary large objects must be reloaded. This flags is only used in SOA contexts

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.CodeFluentReloadOptions.ShadowProperties
member.summary: Shadow properties must be reloaded. Currently not implemented.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.CodeFluentReloadOptions.Everything

member.summary: The default value. Currently defined as Everything.

member.name: M:CodeFluent.Runtime.Diagnostics.TraceRangeCollection.ParseConfigurationTraceRanges(System.String)
member.summary: Parses a formatted text and determines what trace ranges it defines. format is 'levelX-levelY;levelZ;!levelW;!LevelS-LevelX;'. * means all level. !* means no level. example 1: "*;!100-110" means all level, but 100 to 110 example 2: "!*;100-110" means no level, but 100 to 110 example 3: "" means no level (eq. to !*)
member.param: The configuration parameter name to parse. May be null.
member.returns: An array of TraceRange instances.

member.name: M:CodeFluent.Runtime.Diagnostics.TraceRangeCollection.ParseTraceRanges(System.String)
member.summary: Parses a formatted text and determines what trace ranges it defines. format is 'levelX-levelY;levelZ;!levelW;!LevelS-LevelX;'. * means all level. !* means no level. example 1: "*;!100-110" means all level, but 100 to 110 example 2: "!*;100-110" means no level, but 100 to 110 example 3: "" means no level (eq. to !*)
member.param: The text to parse. May be null.
member.returns: An array of TraceRange instances.

member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, reads a sequence of bytes from the current stream and advances the position within the stream by the number of bytes read.

The zero-based byte offset in at which to begin storing the data read from the current stream.
The maximum number of bytes to be read from the current stream.

member.name: T:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.LongPath.FileCopyOptions
member.summary: Defines options for file copy operations.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.LongPath.FileCopyOptions.None
member.summary: No option is defined.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.LongPath.FileCopyOptions.FailIfExists
member.summary: The copy operation fails immediately if the target file already exists.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.LongPath.FileCopyOptions.Restartable
member.summary: Progress of the copy is tracked in the target file in case the copy fails.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.LongPath.FileCopyOptions.OpenSourceForWrite
member.summary: The file is copied and the original file is opened for write access.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.LongPath.FileCopyOptions.AllowDecryptedDestination
member.summary: An attempt to copy an encrypted file will succeed even if the destination copy cannot be encrypted.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.LongPath.FileCopyOptions.CopySymlink
member.summary: If the source file is a symbolic link, the destination file is also a symbolic link pointing to the same file that the source symbolic link is pointing to.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.LongPath.FileCopyOptions.NoBuffering
member.summary: The copy operation is performed using unbuffered I/O, bypassing system I/O cache resources. Recommended for very large file transfers.

member.name: T:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.LongPath.FileMoveOptions
member.summary: Defines options for file move operations.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.LongPath.FileMoveOptions.None
member.summary: No option is defined.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.LongPath.FileMoveOptions.ReplaceExisting
member.summary: If a file named lpNewFileName exists, the function replaces its contents with the contents of the lpExistingFileName file.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.LongPath.FileMoveOptions.CopyAllowed
member.summary: If the file is to be moved to a different volume, the function simulates the move by using other functions.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.LongPath.FileMoveOptions.DelayUntilReboot
member.summary: he system does not move the file until the operating system is restarted.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.LongPath.FileMoveOptions.WriteThrough
member.summary: The function does not return until the file has actually been moved on the disk.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.LongPath.FileMoveOptions.CreateHardLink
member.summary: Reserved for future use.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.LongPath.FileMoveOptions.FailIfNotTrackable
member.summary: he function fails if the source file is a link source, but the file cannot be tracked after the move. This situation can occur if the destination is a volume formatted with the FAT file system.

member.name: T:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.LongPath.ProgressCallbackReason
member.summary: Defines the reason why ProgressRoutine was called.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.LongPath.ProgressCallbackReason.ChunkFinished
member.summary: Another part of the data file was copied.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.LongPath.ProgressCallbackReason.StreamSwithh
member.summary: Another stream was created and is about to be copied. This is the callback reason given when the callback routine is first invoked.

member.name: T:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.LongPath.ProgressResult
member.summary: The return value of the ProgressRoutine.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.LongPath.ProgressResult.Continue
member.summary: Continue the operation.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.LongPath.ProgressResult.Cancel
member.summary: Cancel the operation and delete the destination file.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.LongPath.ProgressResult.Stop
member.summary: Stop the operation. It can be restarted at a later time.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.LongPath.ProgressResult.Quiet
member.summary: Continue the operation, but stop invoking ProgressRoutine to report progress.

member.name: T:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.LongPath.ProgressRoutine
member.summary: Defines a progress routine for file operations
member.param: The total size of the file, in bytes.
The total number of bytes transferred from the source file to the destination file since the copy operation began.
The total size of the current file stream, in bytes.
The total number of bytes in the current stream that have been transferred from the source file to the destination file since the copy operation began.
A handle to the current stream. The first time ProgressRoutine is called, the stream number is 1.
The reason that CopyProgressRoutine was called.
A handle to the source file.
A handle to the destination file
Argument passed to CopyProgressRoutine.
member.returns: The return value of the routine

member.name: T:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.LongPath.EnumerateOptions
member.summary: Defines options for enumeration methods.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.LongPath.EnumerateOptions.None
member.summary: No option is defined.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.LongPath.EnumerateOptions.Recursive
member.summary: Enumeration is recursive.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.LongPath.EnumerateOptions.DepthFirst
member.summary: Enumeration is depth first.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.LongPath.EnumerateOptions.DontOverwriteIfExists
member.summary: Don't overwrite the target if it already exists. Only for copy operation.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.LongPath.EnumerateOptions.DontOverwriteIfIdentical
member.summary: Don't overwrite the target if it already exists and is identical in size and last write time. Only for copy operation.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.LongPath.EnumerateOptions.DontOverwriteIfNewer
member.summary: Don't overwrite the target if it already exists and its last write time is newer. Only for copy operation.

member.name: M:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.DataBindingEvaluator.Eval(System.Object,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Evaluates data-binding expressions at run time.
member.param: The object reference against which the expression is evaluated. This must be a valid object identifier in the page's specified language.

The navigation path from the container object to the public property value to be placed in the bound control property. This must be a string of property or field names separated by periods, such as Tables[0].DefaultView.[0].Price in C# or Tables(0).DefaultView.(0).Price in Visual Basic.
A .NET Framework format string (like those used by String.Format) that converts the Object instance returned by the data-binding expression to a String object.
member.returns: A String object that results from evaluating the data-binding expression and converting it to a string type.

The navigation path from the container object to the public property value to be placed in the bound control property. This must be a string of property or field names separated by periods, such as Tables[0].DefaultView.[0].Price in C# or Tables(0).DefaultView.(0).Price in Visual Basic.
if set to true errors may be throw.
member.returns: A String object that results from evaluating the data-binding expression and converting it to a string type.

member.name: T:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.DiffUtilities
member.summary: A helper class to compute differences between two versions of a text or a text file. Implements 'An O(ND) Difference Algorithm and its Variations" by Eugene Myers Algorithmica Vol. 1 No. 2, 1986, p 251'. Based on the work found at http://www.mathertel.de

member.name: M:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.DiffUtilities.DiffTextFiles(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Find the difference in two text files, comparing by text lines.
member.param: A-version of the file (usualy the old one)
B-version of the file (usualy the new one)
member.returns: A list of differences.

member.name: M:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.DiffUtilities.DiffTextFiles(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Find the difference in two text files, comparing by text lines.
member.param: A-version of the file (usualy the old one)
B-version of the file (usualy the new one)
When set to true, all leading and trailing whitespace characters are stripped out before the comparation is done.
When set to true, all whitespace characters are converted to a single space character before the comparation is done.
When set to true, all characters are converted to their lowercase equivivalence before the comparation is done.
When set to true, all characters between words and non words characters are deleted before the comparation is done.
member.returns: A list of differences.

member.name: M:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.DiffUtilities.DiffText(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Find the difference in two texts, comparing by text lines.
member.param: A-version of the text (usualy the old one)
B-version of the text (usualy the new one)
member.returns: A list of differences.

member.name: M:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.DiffUtilities.DiffText(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Find the difference in two text documents, comparing by text lines.
member.param: A-version of the text (usualy the old one)
B-version of the text (usualy the new one)
When set to true, all leading and trailing whitespace characters are stripped out before the comparation is done.
When set to true, all whitespace characters are converted to a single space character before the comparation is done.
When set to true, all characters are converted to their lowercase equivivalence before the comparation is done.
When set to true, all characters between words and non words characters are deleted before the comparation is done.
member.returns: A list of differences.

member.name: M:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.DiffUtilities.DiffCodes(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Int32},System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: This function converts all textlines of the text into unique numbers for every unique textline so further work can work only with simple numbers.
member.param: the input text
This extern initialized dictionary is used for storing all ever used textlines.
ignore leading and trailing space characters
When set to true, all characters are converted to their lowercase equivivalence before the comparation is done.
When set to true, all whitespace characters are converted to a single space character before the comparation is done.
When set to true, all characters between words and non words characters are deleted before the comparation is done.
member.returns: a array of integers.

member.name: M:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.DiffUtilities.SMS(CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.DiffData,System.Int32,System.Int32,CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.DiffData,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: This is the algorithm to find the Shortest Middle Snake (SMS).
member.param: sequence A
lower bound of the actual range in DataA
upper bound of the actual range in DataA (exclusive)
sequence B
lower bound of the actual range in DataB
upper bound of the actual range in DataB (exclusive)
member.returns: a MiddleSnakeData record containing x,y and u,v

member.name: M:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.DiffUtilities.LCS(CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.DiffData,System.Int32,System.Int32,CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.DiffData,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: This is the divide-and-conquer implementation of the longes common-subsequence (LCS) algorithm. The published algorithm passes recursively parts of the A and B sequences. To avoid copying these arrays the lower and upper bounds are passed while the sequences stay constant.
member.param: sequence A
lower bound of the actual range in DataA
upper bound of the actual range in DataA (exclusive)
sequence B
lower bound of the actual range in DataB
upper bound of the actual range in DataB (exclusive)

members.member: Scan the tables of which lines are inserted and deleted, producing an edit script in forward order. dynamic array

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.JobObjectLimitFlags.DieOnUnhandledException
member.summary: Forces a call to the SetErrorMode function with the SEM_NOGPFAULTERRORBOX flag for each process associated with the job.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.JobObjectLimitFlags.BreakawayOk
member.summary: If any process associated with the job creates a child process using the CREATE_BREAKAWAY_FROM_JOB flag while this limit is in effect, the child process is not associated with the job.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.JobObjectLimitFlags.SilentBreakawayOk
member.summary: Allows any process associated with the job to create child processes that are not associated with the job.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.JobObjectLimitFlags.KillOnJobClose
member.summary: Causes all processes associated with the job to terminate when the last handle to the job is closed.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.JobObjectLimitFlags.SubsetAffinity
member.summary: Allows processes to use a subset of the processor affinity for all processes associated with the job.

member.name: T:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.RegistryKeyOptions
member.summary: Defines options when using a registry key.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.RegistryKeyOptions.REG_OPTION_NON_VOLATILE
member.summary: This key is not volatile; this is the default. The information is stored in a file and is preserved when the system is restarted.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.RegistryKeyOptions.REG_OPTION_VOLATILE
member.summary: All keys created by the function are volatile. The information is stored in memory and is not preserved when the corresponding registry hive is unloaded.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.RegistryKeyOptions.REG_OPTION_CREATE_LINK
member.summary: This key is a symbolic link. Registry symbolic links should only be used for for application compatibility when absolutely necessary.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.RegistryKeyOptions.REG_OPTION_BACKUP_RESTORE
member.summary: If this flag is set, the called function attempts to open the key with the access required to backup or restore the key.

member.name: T:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.RegistryKeyRights
member.summary: Defines specific access rights for registry key objects.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.RegistryKeyRights.KEY_QUERY_VALUE
member.summary: Required to query the values of a registry key.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.RegistryKeyRights.KEY_SET_VALUE
member.summary: Required to create, delete, or set a registry value.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.RegistryKeyRights.KEY_CREATE_SUB_KEY
member.summary: Required to create a subkey of a registry key.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.RegistryKeyRights.KEY_ENUMERATE_SUB_KEYS
member.summary: Required to enumerate the subkeys of a registry key.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.RegistryKeyRights.KEY_NOTIFY
member.summary: Required to request change notifications for a registry key or for subkeys of a registry key.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.RegistryKeyRights.KEY_CREATE_LINK
member.summary: Reserved for system use.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.RegistryKeyRights.KEY_WOW64_64KEY
member.summary: Indicates that an application on 64-bit Windows should operate on the 64-bit registry view. This flag is ignored by 32-bit Windows

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.RegistryKeyRights.KEY_WOW64_32KEY
member.summary: Indicates that an application on 64-bit Windows should operate on the 32-bit registry view. This flag is ignored by 32-bit Windows

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.RegistryKeyRights.DELETE
member.summary: The right to delete the object.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.RegistryKeyRights.READ_CONTROL
member.summary: The right to read the information in the object's security descriptor, not including the information in the system access control list (SACL).

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.RegistryKeyRights.WRITE_DAC
member.summary: The right to modify the discretionary access control list (DACL) in the object's security descriptor.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.RegistryKeyRights.WRITE_OWNER
member.summary: The right to change the owner in the object's security descriptor.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.RegistryKeyRights.KEY_EXECUTE
member.summary: Equivalent to KEY_READ.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.RegistryKeyRights.KEY_READ
member.summary: Combines the STANDARD_RIGHTS_READ, KEY_QUERY_VALUE, KEY_ENUMERATE_SUB_KEYS, and KEY_NOTIFY values.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.RegistryKeyRights.KEY_WRITE
member.summary: Combines the STANDARD_RIGHTS_WRITE, KEY_SET_VALUE, and KEY_CREATE_SUB_KEY access rights.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.RegistryKeyRights.KEY_ALL_ACCESS
member.summary: Combines the STANDARD_RIGHTS_REQUIRED, KEY_QUERY_VALUE, KEY_SET_VALUE, KEY_CREATE_SUB_KEY, KEY_ENUMERATE_SUB_KEYS, KEY_NOTIFY, and KEY_CREATE_LINK access rights.

member.summary: Defines a computer name format.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.SystemUtilities.ComputerNameFormat.NetBIOS
member.summary: The NetBIOS name of the local computer. If the local computer is a node in a cluster, the NetBIOS name of the cluster virtual server.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.SystemUtilities.ComputerNameFormat.DnsHostname
member.summary: The DNS host name of the local computer. If the local computer is a node in a cluster, the DNS host name of the cluster virtual server.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.SystemUtilities.ComputerNameFormat.DnsDomain
member.summary: The name of the DNS domain assigned to the local computer. If the local computer is a node in a cluster, the DNS domain name of the cluster virtual server.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.SystemUtilities.ComputerNameFormat.DnsFullyQualified
member.summary: The fully qualified DNS name that uniquely identifies the local computer. This name is a combination of the DNS host name and the DNS domain name, using the form HostName.DomainName. If the local computer is a node in a cluster, the fully qualified DNS name of the cluster virtual server.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.SystemUtilities.ComputerNameFormat.PhysicalNetBIOS
member.summary: The NetBIOS name of the local computer. If the local computer is a node in a cluster, the NetBIOS name of the local computer, not the name of the cluster virtual server.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.SystemUtilities.ComputerNameFormat.PhysicalDnsHostname
member.summary: The DNS host name of the local computer. If the local computer is a node in a cluster, the DNS host name of the local computer, not the name of the cluster virtual server.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.SystemUtilities.ComputerNameFormat.PhysicalDnsDomain
member.summary: The name of the DNS domain assigned to the local computer. If the local computer is a node in a cluster, the DNS domain name of the local computer, not the name of the cluster virtual server.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.SystemUtilities.ComputerNameFormat.PhysicalDnsFullyQualified
member.summary: The fully qualified DNS name that uniquely identifies the computer. If the local computer is a node in a cluster, the fully qualified DNS name of the local computer, not the name of the cluster virtual server. The fully qualified DNS name is a combination of the DNS host name and the DNS domain name, using the form HostName.DomainName.

member.name: M:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.XmlLineInfoDocument.CreateXmlDeclaration(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates an node with the specified values.
member.param: The version must be "1.0".

The value of the encoding attribute. This is the encoding that is used when you save the to a file or a stream; therefore, it must be set to a string supported by the class, otherwise fails. If this is null or String.Empty, the Save method does not write an encoding attribute on the XML declaration and therefore the default encoding, UTF-8, is used. Note: If the XmlDocument is saved to either a or an , this encoding value is discarded. Instead, the encoding of the TextWriter or the XmlTextWriter is used. This ensures that the XML written out can be read back using the correct encoding.
The value must be either "yes" or "no". If this is null or String.Empty, the Save method does not write a standalone attribute on the XML declaration.
member.returns: The new XmlDeclaration node.
